channel.title: [pi] Making wilderness to a safe area and pk kills with pk board[pi]
channel.description:
How do i make places in the wild non wild safe area. Is there like a boolean to make areas safe if its in the wild. If so what is it.
secondly i have pk points on my server but no pk kills, how do i make it where u get pk kills but they stay there no matter what if you die u dont lose if you buy something from pkp shop you dont lose. The only way it will change is if you kill people it will go up. The reasoning is this i want to make a interface to pops up on a duel arena score board and show top 10 pkers.
then the pk board, i want it make it where you click the board it activates the a case to open a interface that has a list of the top pkers with the pk kills like below [IMG]http://i856.photobucket.com/albums/ab129/im_a_noob_jesusk0/erm%20idk/0000.png[/img]

item.title: [pi] Making wilderness to a safe area and pk kills with pk board[pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

is there anyway at all can you get on team viewer and see whats happening for you can know like whats wrong and can tell me where i can look?

edit:well i made the area i wanted safe but i go out in the wild its perfect ect ect i come back in it still shows im in 10 wild.

item.title: [pi] Making wilderness to a safe area and pk kills with pk board[pi]
item.dc:creator: @99matt99 99matt99
item.description:
@99matt99 wrote:

client . java

		if(inWild() && !isSafe()) {
        wildLevel = 10;
        getPA().walkableInterface(197);
			if(Config.SINGLE_AND_MULTI_ZONES) {
				if(inMulti()) {
					getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);
				} else {
					getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);
				}
			} else {
				getPA().multiWay(-1);
				getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@Level: "+wildLevel, 199);
			}
			getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);

player

	public boolean inWild() {
		if(absX > 2524 && absX < 3847 && absY > 2744 && absY < 3518 ||
			absX > 2773 && absX < 3483 && absY > 2772 && absY < 

3518) {	
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}


	public boolean isSafe() {
		if(absX > 2744 && absX < 3483 && absY > 2773 && absY < 3518 ||
			absX > 2773 && absX < 3483 && absY > 2744 && absY < 

3483) {	
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

Read full topic

@99matt99 wrote:

	public boolean inWild() {
		if(absX > 2524 && absX < 3847 && absY > 2744 && absY < 3518 ||
			absX > 2773 && absX < 3483 && absY > 2772 && absY < 

3518) {	
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}


	public boolean isSafe() {
		if(absX > 2744 && absX < 3483 && absY > 2773 && absY < 3518 ||
			absX > 2773 && absX < 3483 && absY > 2744 && absY < 

3483) {	
			return true;
		}
		return false;
	}

k idk what i did k ill tele home the area i wanted safe is safe but when i step out its not wild and then when i got to the coord of the one corner 2744 3483 all the way up to 2773 3518 is wild and when i tele home it shows that its wild. Every where i go it will show wild but if i tele to the corner 2524 3847 it will be safe and everywhere else it will be safe until i go to that one spot
